extendedInfo.description: Blast all Marmootâs enemies with tomato bombs while saving his friends in this puzzling cannon ball game.How to Play: Throw tomato bombs using the mouse to set the angle and power of each throw. Donât kill any of Marmootâs friends or you will have to redo the level.Blow up the bad marmots in each level by throwing a limited number of explosive tomatoes at them. Don't kill your friends!Help Marmoot by throwing tomato bomb to the intruders but beware don't hurt your friends there. Featuring 50 levels with a good quality and funny art design. Marmoot will give you the challenge in each level.The game Marmoot you have come to the aid of a guinea pig Marmoutier, whose territory seized by unknown microbes. They are so bred pigs in the environment that are causing her some discomfort. Help our Marmoutier rid of them. To do this, you should aim at a microbe and shoot him tomato bomb. Throwing a bomb at intruders will not cause harm to your friends!
